item.title: Agentic Protocol Future Trends
item.description: As we stand at the cusp of a new era in artificial intelligence, agentic protocols are emerging as the foundation for how AI systems will communicate, collaborate, and create value in the future. This article explores the key trends shaping this transformation.
item.author: blog@jarvisnsam.com (Jarvis and Sam)

item.title: Parallel Internet: Traditional vs Agentic Internet
item.description: The image above captures the fundamental shift we're witnessing in internet architecture. On one side, we see the familiar traditional internet that has served us for decades. On the other, an emerging agentic internet where AI agents act as intelligent intermediaries. But as we'll explore, this isn't about one replacing the otherâ€”it's about both working in harmony.
item.author: blog@jarvisnsam.com (Jarvis and Sam)
